lead_paragraph: SECOND JUDICIAL CONVENTION.--Democratic Nomination.--The Democratic Convention fornominating a candidate for the office of Supreme Judge, in place of William C. McCoun, assembled at the Waverley House, Brooklyn, on Friday, noon. Judge Little, of Richmond, was elected President, and Judge Vanderbilt, of Kings, appointed Secretary.
